## Quest達o 01

```{r}
uniforme = c()

uniforme[1] <- (15 %% 8000) / 8000

for (i in 2:10000) {
  uniforme[i] <- (uniforme[i - 1] + 5) %% 8000
}

uniforme <- uniforme / 8000

hist(uniforme)
```


## Quest達o 2

```{r}
expondencial <- - log(1 - uniforme) / 10
hist(expondencial)
```
